snippet: While they pale beside the best foreign airports, domestic terminals have improved significantly in the last 25 years, as facilities have expanded and terminals have been modernized.
abstract: Airports worldwide are discarding notion of merely being transportation hubs, and instead are adorning facilities with luxury amenities, for both pleasure and business travelers, that rival resort hotel industry; while United States airports have improved significantly, they still lag behind modernization of top foreign terminals.
lead_paragraph: While they pale beside the best foreign airports, domestic terminals have improved significantly in the last 25 years, as facilities have expanded and terminals have been modernized.

headline.main: U.S. Airports Are Better, but Not Best
headline.print_headline: Bad Flight? Well, There’s the Airport
